publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1773 Robin Harper: Post of Minister for the Environment—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision not to reappoint the senior post of Minister for the Environment and to pass overall responsibility for the environment to the Minister with the existing portfolio for Rural Development, and asks the Executive to review this decision and reinstate the post of Minister for the Environment, or an equivalent post, as a separate and discrete responsibility at the earliest opportunity.
S1M-1773 Post of Minister for the Environment (lodged on 21 March 2001) Bruce Crawford*

S1M-1773 Robin Harper: Post of Minister for the Environment—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision not to reappoint the senior post of Minister for the Environment and to pass overall responsibility for the environment to the Minister with the existing portfolio for Rural Development, and asks the Executive to review this decision and reinstate the post of Minister for the Environment, or an equivalent post, as a separate and discrete responsibility at the earliest opportunity. Supported by: Bruce Crawford
S1M-1773 Post of Minister for the Environment (lodged on 21 March 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-1773 Post of Minister for the Environment (lodged on 21 March 2001) Andrew Wilson*, Alex Neil*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-1773 Post of Minister for the Environment (lodged on 21 March 2001) Linda Fabiani*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-1773 Post of Minister for the Environment (lodged on 21 March 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*, Ms Sandra White*

S1M-1773 Robin Harper: Post of Minister for the Environment—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision not to reappoint the senior post of Minister for the Environment and to pass overall responsibility for the environment to the Minister with the existing portfolio for Rural Development, and asks the Executive to review this decision and reinstate the post of Minister for the Environment, or an equivalent post, as a separate and discrete responsibility at the earliest opportunity. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Gil Paterson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-1773 Post of Minister for the Environment (lodged on 21 March 2001) Kay Ullrich*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-1773 Post of Minister for the Environment (lodged on 21 March 2001) Fiona McLeod*

S1M-1773 Robin Harper: Post of Minister for the Environment—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision not to reappoint the senior post of Minister for the Environment and to pass overall responsibility for the environment to the Minister with the existing portfolio for Rural Development, and asks the Executive to review this decision and reinstate the post of Minister for the Environment, or an equivalent post, as a separate and discrete responsibility at the earliest opportunity. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Gil Paterson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Kay Ullrich, Christine Grahame, Fiona McLeod

S1M-1773 Robin Harper: Post of Minister for the Environment—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision not to reappoint the senior post of Minister for the Environment and to pass overall responsibility for the environment to the Minister with the existing portfolio for Rural Development, and asks the Executive to review this decision and reinstate the post of Minister for the Environment, or an equivalent post, as a separate and discrete responsibility at the earliest opportunity. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Gil Paterson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Kay Ullrich, Christine Grahame, Fiona McLeod

S1M-1773 Robin Harper: Post of Minister for the Environment—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision not to reappoint the senior post of Minister for the Environment and to pass overall responsibility for the environment to the Minister with the existing portfolio for Rural Development, and asks the Executive to review this decision and reinstate the post of Minister for the Environment, or an equivalent post, as a separate and discrete responsibility at the earliest opportunity. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Andrew Wilson, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Gil Paterson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Kay Ullrich, Christine Grahame, Fiona McLeod
S1M-1773 Post of Minister for the Environment (lodged on 21 March 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-1773 Robin Harper: Post of Minister for the Environment—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision not to reappoint the senior post of Minister for the Environment and to pass overall responsibility for the environment to the Minister with the existing portfolio for Rural Development, and asks the Executive to review this decision and reinstate the post of Minister for the Environment, or an equivalent post, as a separate and discrete responsibility at the earliest opportunity.
